mapper.select: SELECT wfm.fst_msg_id as id, wfm.msg_type as msg_type, wfm.article_id as article_id, wfm.account_id as account_id, wfm.remark as remark, wfm.create_name as createName, wfm.create_time as createTime, wfm.update_name as updateName, wfm.update_time as updateTime FROM wx_first_rep_msg AS wfm WHERE wfm.account_id=#{accountid}
select count(*) from wx_first_rep_msg AS wfm WHERE wfm.account_id=#{accountid}
select wa.content from wx_article wa LEFT JOIN wx_first_rep_msg wfm on wa.article_id=wfm.article_id where wfm.account_id=#{userid} and wfm.msg_type=0;

SELECT wa.article_id as id, wa.title as Title, wa.description as Description, wa.picurl as PicUrl, wa.url as Url, wa.content as content, wa.create_name as createName, wa.create_time as createTime, wa.update_name as updateName, wa.update_time as updateTime
FROM wx_rel_article_account AS wraa LEFT JOIN wx_first_rep_msg AS wfrm ON wraa.aa_id=wfrm.article_id LEFT JOIN wx_article AS wa ON wa.article_id=wraa.article_id where wfrm.account_id=#{userid}
